alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex; Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 8:32PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: A developing line of showers along a cold front extends from the southern Poconos into Berks County as of 830 PM. Expect this line to intensify as it moves eastward, reaching the I-95 corridor from Wilmington through Philadelphia and Trenton by 10 PM and clearing the coast by midnight. Locally damaging winds may occur in places as the line moves through and will be covered with the issuance of Severe Thunderstorm Warnings if necessary, despite that there may continue to be little to no lightning. Following the passage of the cold front, a period of strong west winds gusting 40 to 50 mph can be expected before winds diminish overnight.

area.areaDesc: Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex; Kent; New Castle
